function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of critical assessment of COVID-19 impacts","Impact":"Potential failure to understand the full scope of economic, social, and environmental impacts of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough and evidence-based assessments of the impacts on trade, employment, social and public health, and the environment","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, impact assessment frameworks","People":"Researchers, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, government bodies"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of systemic influences on impact","Impact":"Ineffective responses to COVID-19 impacts due to overlooking the systemic context of the modern industrial economy","Mitigation":"Adopt a systems theory perspective to understand the contextual influences on impacts and responses","Technologies":"Systems theory models, ecosystem analysis tools","People":"Economists, sociologists, environmental scientists","Owner":"Academic institutions, research organizations"},{"Description":"Failure to address the self-organizing and growth limitations of the global economy","Impact":"Inability to anticipate and mitigate the structural irreversibility and growth slowdown in the global economy, leading to future uncertainty","Mitigation":"Develop strategies to address structural irreversibility and manage growth limitations in the global economy","Technologies":"Economic modeling tools, scenario planning software","People":"Economic analysts, policy planners, industry leaders","Owner":"Financial institutions, policy think tanks"}]}
